title: King Charles' telling move on Canada trip that 'won't have gone unnoticed by Trump'
content: King Charles was widely seen as delivering a warning shot to US president Donald Trump after his verbal attacks on Canada by delivering a speech at the start of new session of the Canadian Parliament - and royal expert Jennie Bond believes one move by the King made the impact of the message to Trump even greater

title: Ukraine swarms panicked Russia with drones after Putin threatens Trump with WW3
content: Ukraine's drone attacks caused widespread disruption across Russia, with Moscow's airports being forced to close and damage to residential buildings reported across the capital

title: Homeless Brit backpacker's normal life before Peru - festivals, uni and adventure
content: Concern grew for Hannah Almond, a fashion graduate from Grimsby in Lincolnshire, after she became stranded from her friends in Peru during a backpacking holiday

title: 'I talked dozens out of lethal Titan sub trip - one refused and now he's dead'
content: Ahead of the disaster that was revisited in the BBC documentary 'Implosion: The Titan Sub Disaster on BBC, expedition consultant Rob McCallum tried to warn Stockton Rush he had "huge concerns" about his submersible

title: Newlywed groom killed by parcel bomb disguised as wedding present
content: A groom was shockingly killed by a bomb that was disguised as a wedding gift, just 5 days after he was married, and a man has finally been found guilty 7 years after the crime that shocked India

title: Skeletal remains posted to police 40 years ago finally identified as missing teacher
content: In a stunning discovery, skeletal remains have been identified four decades after they were sent to police as Kay Josephine Medin, who vanished from her home in 1987

title: Paedo surgeon who abused 299 kids recorded sick birthday tradition in twisted diary
content: French medic Joel Le Scouarnec has been sentenced to a maximum term of 20 years in jail for sexually abusing hundreds of patients, mostly children. His diaries were a crucial part of the prosecution's case against him

title: Chilling moment taxi driver threatens to 'break tourist's bones' on dark detour
content: During a shocking confrontation that was caught on camera, tourist Dustin was threatened by a taxi driver who warned him, "I have mafia connections, I will break your bones"

title: Women mount desperate escape bids from Saudi Arabia 'secret rehabilitation prisons'
content: Women without prospect of leaving have mounted desperate bids to escape from Dar al-Reaya 'care homes' after allegedly being subject to abusive 'hell' conditions

title: Israel claims it has killed Hamas leader 'the Shadow ' Mohammed Sinwar in deadly air strike
content: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu confirmed to the government that Israel had killed Mohammed Sinwar earlier this month - the militant group's top military leader and younger brother of slain Yahya Sinwar

title: Warped killer butchered helpless student and put body parts in post
content: Hundreds of citizen detectives were determined to learn the identity of depraved Luka Magnotta months before he committed a brutal murder, even warning authorities he was set to kill

title: French paedophile surgeon who abused hundreds of children jailed for 20 years
content: Joel Le Scouarnec, 74, has been at the centre of one of France's largest-ever child sex abuse cases having admitted abusing hundreds of children and he has now been sentenced to 20 years in jail

title: Mum's gruesome death as she's killed and swallowed whole by gigantic python
content: The woman, 54, became the second person in Indonesia to be killed and digested by the snake species in just over a year as the animal is not known to attack humans

title: Farmer's gruesome last moments as pet hippo 'like his son' mauled him to death
content: WARNING - GRAPHIC CONTENT: Army major Marius Els was killed by his pet hippo Humphrey, the 1.2 tonne animal had been living on his 400 acre farm for years

title: Screaming rollercoaster riders trapped at 50ft for three hours in horror scenes
content: Thrill-seekers at a theme park screamed in horror after a rollercoaster ride named "Topgun" suddenly froze mid-air, trapping them at 50ft in heart-stopping scenes

title: Expert warns of fatal error to avoid during bear attack following terrifying incident
content: A horrifying bear attack has left a woman critically injured just miles from a European city, but not many people are aware of what they should do if they encounter a bear

title: Ibiza horror as Brit boy, 8, in plunge from third floor window in San Antonio
content: The eight-year-old underwent an emergency operation in Ibiza and was airlifted onwards to a hospital in the Majorcan capital after he fell over a balcony in San Antonio

title: Teen knifeman 'killed four and burned down home after trying to rape girl, 14'
content: Knifeman Mikhail Paramonov reportedly slew five people while staying at a Russian country house in Baikalsk, Irkutsk, before burning down the property and killing himself

title: Inside dark anti-natalist 'cult' - suicides, 'brainwashing' and IVF clinic bomb
content: Guy Bartkus, 25, was named as a suspect by the FBI in the horrific car bomb detonation that damaged the American Reproductive Centres building in Palm Springs, Los Angeles

title: Desperate Brits mocked after making mad dash for Benidorm sun loungers
content: Sun starved tourists in Brit hotspot Benidorm can be seen lining up in the hotel before the gates to the pool open - sparking a frantic bid to secure the best spots

title: Inside the mystery as missing Brit Hannah Almond found living rough in Peru
content: Hannah Almond, from Grimsby, was violently robbed while on holiday in Peru and after losing her belongings she was left living rough on the streets having suffered a mental health crisis

title: Moment worker dodges death by just inches as chemical tanks explode killing five
content: Terrifying footage caught the moment the worker tried to flee the shaking building as a huge tank he was standing on burst into flames and collapsed in the blast - which claimed at least five lives

title: Mother's devastating warning after daughter unwittingly snorted a lethal combination of nine drugs
content: Rebecca Turner died while on holiday in Bangkok after unknowingly consuming a deadly mix of nine drugs, believing it was cocaine. Her heartbroken mother, Anita Turner, has now issued a warning to others

title: Urgent warning to British youths after lad dies in viral 'rugby collision' challenge
content: Ryan Satterthwaite, 19, went "downhill" after a collision in a viral rugby game that is sweeping social media. It has sparked a wave of warnings for any youngsters who want to try it

title: House where Jesus' Last Supper took place with disciples 'close to being discovered'
content: The room is briefly described in the Book of Luke 22:11-13, when Jesus Christ requested a large, furnished upper room where he and his disciples could eat their Passover meal
